description:
Description


VITAMIN BOOST FOR A HEALTHIER SCALPPacked with vitamin derivatives and Vitamin C, this scalp treatment promotes collagen production to improve scalp health. A healthier scalp creates the ideal environment for stronger, more resilient hair, helping to revitalize thinning or weakened hair
LOW-MOLECULAR COLLAGEN FOR DAMAGED HAIREnriched with 2,033ppm of low-molecular collagen, this treatment penetrates deeply into each hair strand. It repairs and strengthens damaged hair, restoring its natural elasticity, shine, and smoothness, even for hair that has been chemically treated or exposed to environmental stressors
DEEP HYDRATION FOR SOFT & SMOOTH HAIRThe moisture barrier formed by this treatment locks in hydration, preventing hair from becoming dry or frizzy. It leaves your hair feeling soft, smooth, and nourished, providing long-lasting moisture and protection from environmental damage
SAFE, CLEAN, AND FAMILY-FRIENDLYFree from silicone oils, tar-based dyes, parabens, sulfates, and artificial fragrances, this product is gentle and safe for all family members. It’s dermatologically tested, ensuring it works for all skin types and provides a clean, worry-free hair care experience
 
How To Use

 For best results, wet hair and scalp thoroughly with warm water. Apply an adequate amount of the treatment evenly to your scalp and hair, gently massaging it in. Rinse thoroughly with water to leave hair soft, smooth, and deeply nourished
 
Key Ingredients

Vitamin derivatives and Vitamin C boost collagen generation.
Collagen nourishes damaged and fatigued scalp.

description:
Description


The Treecell Forte Ampoule Treatment is a reviving treatment for severely damaged hair.
It is a genuine product for severely damaged hair that sold out within three days of its release.
The feeling of healthy hair after use, the feeling that the hair is soft after use, and the feeling that the volume of the hair is restored after use all received 100% satisfaction in the usability evaluation.
 
How To Use

1. While the hair is still wet, apply the ampoule evenly to the scalp and hair after shampooing.
2. Massage the ampoule formula from the hair to the scalp once it has turned into a cream.
3. Thoroughly rinse with warm water.
When stored at low temperatures, the product may solidify, but this is due to the characteristic of the highly concentrated formulation.
 
Key Ingredients

The product's effect is enhanced by a high concentration of 95% of 20 nutrient ingredient ampoules tailored to extremely damaged hair of 3 types of water-soluble protein + 17 types of amino acids that make up the hair.

description:
Description


Triple Bonding Treatment
The majority of hair is made up of protein.
When the bonds between proteins weaken, the hair becomes damaged, eventually leading to split ends and breakage.
However, once broken, the protein bonds cannot be restored.

With Treecell's exclusive bonding ingredient, bond broken proteins, boost them, and coat them!
Experience a 3-step care routine all at once!
Discover the power of strong bonding that firmly sticks!
 
How To Use

Distribute onto damp hair and massage thoroughly. Rinse well with warm water
extra_description: Distribute onto damp hair and massage thoroughly. Rinse well with warm water

description:
Description

Introducing "Damage Therapy Leave-In Treatment" - your solution to achieving luscious, healthy hair that shines with vitality. Infused with the finest natural ingredients from the sea, this innovative treatment is designed to repair, hydrate, and nourish your locks, leaving them looking and feeling their absolute best. 
Formulated with Marine Collagen and Himalayan Pink Salt, our Damage Therapy No-Wash Treatment is a powerhouse blend that works wonders for all hair types. Say goodbye to tangles, frizz, and dryness as this treatment detangles, hydrates, and fights frizz with every spray. Plus, it's the perfect pre-styling step, providing heat protection to keep your hair looking sleek and smooth. 
But that's not all - our exclusive Seaweed Complex goes beyond mere hydration, penetrating deep into the hair shaft to moisturize and restore even the most damaged, frizzy strands. Say hello to hair that's soft, supple, and full of life.

And let's not forget about repairs. With our Protein Complex and Ceramide NP, our treatment targets dry, damaged cuticles, helping to repair and strengthen them from within. Say goodbye to split ends and hello to hair that's resilient and full of bounce. 
We're committed to not only providing you with amazing hair care products but also caring for the environment. That's why our Damage Therapy Leave-In Treatment comes in eco-friendly packaging made from 30% PCR (post-consumer recycled) materials and FSC-certified paper, ensuring a better Earth for future generations.

Experience the beauty found in the sea - your trusted partner in achieving healthy, beautiful hair. With our professional cosmeceutical haircare brand, you can enjoy instant improvements with natural sea ingredients and professional technology, all while embarking on a journey to healthier hair and scalp and for systematic solutions that deliver real results.
 
How To Use
After shampooing, spray evenly at a distance of 10~15cm mainly for damaged and tangled hair in towel-dried wet hair, then dry.
extra_description: After shampooing, spray evenly at a distance of 10~15cm mainly for damaged and tangled hair in towel-dried wet hair, then dry.

description:
Description

Salon-Quality Deep Hydration – This argan oil-infused conditioner intensely hydrates and brings moisture and shine to dry, brittle hair for a salon-fresh feel at home. Perfect for restoring life and luster to dull hair, leaving it looking and feeling silky smooth.
Damage Prevention & Deep Penetration – With panthenol to shield against damage and argan kernel oil for deep penetration, it leaves hair naturally soft, glossy, and vibrant. The powerful formula nourishes from the inside out, revitalizing hair for a healthy glow.
16 Amino Acids & HAIRCLE Boost – Enriched with 20,000 PPM of HAIRCLE, it repairs and strengthens hair bonds, providing a boost of shine and resilience. This unique amino acid blend restores essential proteins, reinforcing hair structure and elasticity.
Volume & Smoothness for Damaged Hair – Maintains root volume while smoothing out damage, split ends, and frizz, re-linking broken bonds for a healthier look.Designed to tame frizz without weighing down, giving hair a natural bounce and shine.

reviews.title: Great Results
reviews.content: As most aging woman, I started having concerns with hair loss and since I suffer from autoimmune disease as well, I had my concerns. I noticed after the first use, less and less hair falling out in the shower. I feel this bonding “conditioner” has strengthened my hair while using both shampoo and this. Little of this will go a long way but I do have thick hair. I have very wavy hair that I flat iron straight daily and have seen an improvement. I will continue to use this product and hope to see the strengthening results as I’ve seen in the first few weeks of use. Now if I can figure out how to limit the grays from coming, #goals! This product and this line has been working and would recommend it for anyone with concerns about hair loss. Give it a try.

product_name: RX Amino Keratin Heat Protecting Leave In Treatment 150ml
description:
Description

01. Heat Protecting leave-in Treatment for damaged hair
This Leave-in cream strengthens slightly damaged hair and provides heat 
protection. Use it before styling to prevent damage from styling tools.
02. A nourishing leave-in Treatment with Keratin
A leave-in treatment infused with keratin that strengthens slightly damaged 
hair, adds deep nutrition and imparts long-lasting softness and shine. This 
lightweight, silky essence type formula work as treatment for wet hair, also 
work as serum for dry hair.
03. Microbiome-friendly perfumes, malodor 
counteractant technology
This Perfume helps to activate microbiome minimize irritation and truly 
covers bad smells for a good feeling.
 
How To Use
After shampooing and conditioning, apply an appropriate 
amount to clean, towel dried hair. Massage onto length and ends. Do not 
rinse but Blowdry

description:
Description


It is a functional treatment to help relieve hair loss symptoms that can be used on scalp and hair. It volumizes thinning hair by alleviating dead skin on hair root and contains hot spring water to help improve hair shine and scalp elasticity.

Relieve hair loss and give shiny and volumizing look

How To Use

Use once a day as follows.

Wet your scalp and hair with lukewarm water.

Apply appropriate amount onto scalp and hair.

Wash off with lukewarm water after 2-3 minutes.

Key Ingredients

description:
Description

Our Heating Guard No-Wash Treatment from our UNOVE line is a no-wash, no frills solution to treating damaged hair that even withstands up to 200°C temperatures.  
When absorbed into the hair and exposed to heat, the treatment melts smoothly, filling cuticles with nutrients and restoring damaged hair.  Packed with 10,000ppm of keratin-PF and a signature blend of other nutrients/amino acids, this treatment will restore even the most damaged hair. 
-Help seal hair cuticle to eliminate frizz and add softness and shine while moisturizing dry cuticles.
-Add softness and strengthen hair by penetrating the hair shaft and locking in moisture.

Suggested Use

Apply a small amount on the towel-dried wet hair, especially on the damaged parts, and dry.  
If used before a straightener, apply a smaller amount on the dry hair.

description:
Description
1. Vegitable Glycerin, 5 hyaluronic acids*, and sugar cane-derived betaine quench the insatiable thirst of dry hair, with hydrolyzed proteins in smaller particles through hydrolysis and nourishing nutrients of rosemary, oregano, and ginger brewed with a decoction method creating a resilient texture by providing rich nutrients to hair both inside and out.2. Organic Moringa oil, Babassu oil, and Argan oil provide triple coating layer to the surface of rough hair with cuticles to make hair smooth, glossy, and healthy.3. Panthenol, Biotin, Taurine, and Caffeine provide perfect care including lost elasticity as well as smoothness without missing an inch.4. *5 hyaluronic acid
- Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer: Forms a dewy moisture hydrating shield and Moisture retention.
- Sodium Hyaluronate: A moisture magnet that attracts surrounding moisture.
- Hyaluronic Acid: Strong moisturizing effect with adhesion moisture care.
- Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid: Upgraded moisturizing power with excellent moisture delivery.
- Hydrolyzed Glycosaminoglycans: A compact moisturizing effect with active ingredients acquired from ear mushroom and shiitake mushrooms.

Suggested Use

After shampooing, apply evenly throughout hair length. Leave in 2-3 minutes and rinse thoroughly. For the best result, wear a shower cap.

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.content: It's good but it needs more time to show improvement.

reviews.title: Some by mi
reviews.content:
If you’re looking for a hair care routine that truly supports healthy hair growth, this trio from Some By Mi is a must! I’ve been using the Cica Peptide Anti Hair Loss Shampoo, Scalp Treatment, and Scalp Tonic together, and the results have been amazing.

The Shampoo gently cleanses the scalp without stripping it, while the Treatment deeply nourishes and strengthens the roots. It leaves my scalp feeling calm, soothed, and refreshed. The star for me is the Scalp Tonic — it gives a cooling sensation and helps stimulate circulation for healthier, stronger hair over time.

Using all three products together has made a noticeable difference in reducing hair fall and promoting growth. My scalp feels healthier, and my hair feels stronger and fuller. I highly recommend using them as a set for the best results!

description:
Description



This coating protein treatment lives up to the hype as Elizabecca’s bestselling hair product.Protects and supplies nutrients to hair damaged by dyeing or frequent styling.Quick and convenient in-home care possible hair product.Recommend! Damage-hair of Intense heat or in the sun.

Collagen and Ceramide also pamper your scalp and and help repair broken strands, leaving hair silky and shiny.
